about_the_game:
WRAIN is a single-player cosmic adventure where your end is just the beginning. Solve intricate puzzles to appease Death, learn from lost souls in the Spirit Realm, gain forbidden knowledge, and unravel the dark secrets of a mysterious island. Tread carefully—or else you may become another lost voice in the chorus of the damned.

Discovery through Death

Embark on an unconventional path to discovery, where each unique death is a stepping stone to unravelling the island's secrets and your place in it. Embrace your mortality to visit the Spirit Realm, solve puzzles, unveil new pathways, and manipulate the world around you in ever-more ingenious ways.

Forbidden Knowledge

Secrets whisper in the wind, carried by the voices of lost souls. These restless spirits hold the key to unravelling your past and the island's true purpose. Will you learn from their harrowing tales, or be lead astray to become another lost voice in the chorus of the damned?

A Surreal Adventure

An enigmatic story with dark humor told through cinematic sequences woven into the gameplay, twisting and unfolding into an unexpected conclusion. What choices are you willing to make? How will your story end?

Key Features

  • Master Death to Solve Puzzles. Embrace an innovative death mechanic where dying is not the end, but the key to unlocking new pathways, solving intricate puzzles, and uncovering hidden secrets.

  • Explore a Dark, Supernatural World. Journey through a dystopian island and the eerie Spirit Realm, where the lines between life and death blur. Unravel the mysteries of a world shaped by tyranny and lost souls.

  • Shape Your Fate with Meaningful Choices. Your decisions throughout the game have lasting consequences, leading to multiple possible endings. Uncover hidden truths, forge your own path, and determine the fate of both yourself and the island.

  • Deep Philosophical Themes. Dive into a story that challenges concepts of life, death, free will, and power, intertwined with a haunting mystery that evolves based on your actions.

  • Immersive Exploration. Traverse atmospheric, forgotten landscapes filled with abandoned mechanisms from a bygone time. Interact with lost spirits and reawaken long dormant systems and machinery to piece together the hidden pathways and deep secrets of the island.

  • Haunting Atmosphere & Supernatural Horror. Experience a dark and suspenseful world filled with eerie soundscapes, haunting visuals, and supernatural horror that immerses you in a gripping mystery-adventure.

content_descriptors.notes:
WRAIN features dark comedic depictions of self-inflicted accidents as essential elements of both gameplay and storytelling. Players will encounter exaggerated, cartoonish scenarios such as jumping off cliffs or accidental electrocution to progress. 

This content is intended for humor and is integral to the game's narrative, not to trivialize serious matters. Viewer discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
